A JSON object containing info about the backtest to use for the report. The /backtests/read/report API accepts requests in the following format:

BacktestReportRequest Model - Request to read out the report of a backtest.
projectId integer
required
Id of the project to read.
backtestId string
required
Id of the backtest to read.
Example 
{
  "projectId": 0,
  "backtestId": "string"
}
